tetra/schematic/greatsword/heavy_blade.d: Replace the current sword blade with a large and hefty blade that always sweeps on fully charged swings.
tetra.module.greatsword/heavy_blade.name: Heavy blade
tetra.module.greatsword/heavy_blade.desc: A large and hefty blade that sacrifices attack speed for increased damage, always sweeps on fully charged swings.
tetra/schematic/greatsword/basic_hilt/ba: Replaces the current hilt with a new one crafted from the provided material.
tetra.module.greatsword/basic_hilt.name: Simple hilt
tetra.module.greatsword/basic_hilt.descr: A simple sword hilt. The sword hilt is the primary source of integrity for swords.

Hone the module to increase the damage dealt.
Hone: Damage II
Further hone the damage improvement for this module, increasing the damage bonus.

tetra/schematic/greatsword/shared_blade/: Serrate
Serrates the blade, providing a saw-tooth edged blade. Has a 30%% chance to cause the target to bleed for 4 damage over 2 seconds. Not effective against undead.
Hone: Serrated II
Hone the serrated improvement, increases the damage dealt.
Hone: Serrated III
Further hone the serrated improvement, increases the damage dealt.
Temper
Temper the point of the blade, greatly increasing its hardness. Causes some of the damage dealt to ignore armor.
Hone: Tempered II
Further temper the blade to improve the armor penetration effect.
Hone: Tempered III
Further temper the blade to improve the armor penetration effect.
Carve hook
Carve a hook into the back side of the blade, providing additional damage when hitting unsuspecting enemies. Cause critical strikes when attacking enemies from behind.
Hone: Hooked II
Hone the hooked improvement, increases the bonus damage dealt when hitting enemies from behind to 75%%.
Hone: Hooked III
Further hone the hooked improvement, increases the bonus damage dealt when hitting enemies from behind to 125%%.
tetra/schematic/greatsword/basic_hilt/wr: Wrap the hilt using the provided materials. Slighly increases damage and speed, and reduces negative effects potentially caused by the hilt.
tetra.module.greatsword/decorative_pomme: A decorative pommel, it provides a small amount of durability but has no functional value.
tetra/schematic/greatsword/wide_guard.de: Craft a wide guard which protects the wielding hand, providing additional armor when held in the mainhand or offhand.
tetra.module.greatsword/wide_guard.name: Wide guard
tetra.module.greatsword/wide_guard.descr: a wide guard which protects the wielding hand. Provides additional armor when the sword is held in the mainhand or offhand.
Craft a sturdy guard which can block incoming attacks if timed correctly.
tetra.module.greatsword/sturdy_guard.des: A sturdy guard which can block incoming attacks if timed correctly.
tetra/schematic/greatsword/socket.name: Socket
tetra/schematic/greatsword/socket.descri: Socket a gem into the sword, providing different effects depending on the gem.
tetra.module.greatsword/socket.name: Socket
tetra.module.greatsword/socket.descripti: A gem, fitted onto the sword where the blade meets the hilt. The gem is enchanted and provides magical boons to the wielder of the sword.
tetra.variant.greatsword_socket/pristine:
A gem, fitted onto the sword where the blade meets the hilt. The gem is enchanted and provides magical boons to the wielder of the sword.
 
The gem is of pristine quality and provides improved effects compared to a gem of lesser quality.

A gem, fitted onto the sword where the blade meets the hilt. The gem is enchanted and provides magical boons to the wielder of the sword.
 
The gem is of pristine quality and provides improved effects compared to a gem of lesser quality.

A gem, fitted onto the sword where the blade meets the hilt. The gem is enchanted and provides magical boons to the wielder of the sword.
 
The gem is of pristine quality and provides improved effects compared to a gem of lesser quality.
tetra.variant.greatsword_socket/mana_run: A rune, fitted onto the sword where the blade meets the hilt. The rune uses mana to repair the item over time.
tetra/schematic/greatsword/counterweight: Balance the blade with a counterweight. Increases the attack speed by §f0.15§r, this bonus is reduced by §f0.05§r for each point of difference between the total integrity use and the effect level.
tetra.module.greatsword/counterweight.de: A counterweight attached to the bottom of the hilt. Increases the attack speed by 0.15 if the counterweight effect level matches the total integrity for the item, the bonus is reduced by 0.05 for each point of difference between the integrity use and the effect level.
tetra/schematic/greatsword/reinforced_fu: Reinforce the fuller using the given material. Provides additional integrity and reduces the chance for the item to take damage, but makes the sword heavier and slower to swing.
tetra.module.greatsword/reinforced_fulle: A fuller reinforcement that provides additional integrity and reduces the chance for the item to take damage, but makes the sword heavier and slower to swing.
tetra/schematic/greatsword/binding.name: Binding
tetra/schematic/greatsword/binding.descr: Tighten the binding between the hilt and the blade by wrapping it with rope or straps, or by using completely different materials and methods.
tetra.module.greatsword/binding.name: Binding
tetra.module.greatsword/binding.descript: Tightly bound fibre strengthen the blade's attachment to the hilt.
tetra.variant.greatsword_binding/bolt.de: An adjustable bolt attaches the blade to the hilt.
tetra.tweak.greatsword_tweak/binding_bol:
§eTighten§r the bolt to make the sword more stiff, increasing damage.
§eLoosen§r the bolt to allow for a softer rebound, effectively increasing durability.
tetra/schematic/greatsword/grip_loop.des: Attach a loop at the end of the hilt, which increases the reach of the sword. Also increases the range of sweeping attacks by 2 blocks.
tetra.module.greatsword/grip_loop.name: Grip loop
tetra.module.greatsword/grip_loop.descri: A loop attached at the end of the hilt that increases the reach of the sword. Also increases the range of sweeping attacks by 2 blocks.
tetra/schematic/greatsword/flamberge_bla:
Replace the current sword blade with a flamberge.
 
Material §fhardness§r increases §fdamage§r.
tetra/schematic/greatsword/crucible/cruc:
Replace the current sword blade with a crucible blade.
 
Material §fhardness§r increases §fdamage§r.
tetra.module.greatsword/crucible_blade.d: Rip and Tear, until it is done.
Replace the current sword blade with an odachi blade, an honorable sword.
 
Material §fhardness§r increases §fdamage§r.
A sword guard, its weak construction provides little protection for the wielding hand.
A longsword, a robust dual-handed blade.
tetra/schematic/greatsword/longsword_bla:
Replace the current sword blade with a longsword blade.
 
Material §fhardness§r increases §fdamage§r.
